messages.title: Enough is Enough
messages.content: Pledging to End Youth Unemployment in Hove & Portslade

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Peter Kyle pledges to end youth unemployment in Hove & Portslade, focusing on helping young people that have been out of work due to secondary education issues or local economy problems.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have long believed that political leaders should stand up and show real leadership on the issues they are especially qualified on. As someone who left school with no qualifications aged 25 and started all over again, but went on to run his own successful small business in the city. I pledge to end youth unemployment in Hove & Portslade.

politicalExperience.achievements: Peter Kyle discusses his own journey from leaving school at age 25 and starting all over again to running his own successful small business in the city.

quotes.text: I pledge to end youth unemployment in Hove & Portslade.
I hope this pledge will demonstrate how serious I am about tackling it.

images.caption: Peter meets staff and young adults at the Hangleton & Knoll Youth Project
Labour News - Enough is Enough - Pledging to End Youth Unemployment in Hove & Portslade
